converter module¶

converter.convert_asp_results(results)¶

Converts ASP answers to a lists of lists and string.

Format:

  • list of lists: [[feature_id_1, sign_1], [feature_id_2, sign_2]], e.g., [[miR_1, positive], [miR_2, negative]]

  • string: gate_input(gate_id, feature_id, sign) gate_input(gate_id, feature_id, sign), e.g., gate_input(1, miR_1, positive) gate_input(1, miR_2, negative)

Parameters

results (list) – list containing results in a solver-returned format

Returns

formatted results

Return type

list

converter.convert_solution_to_list(inputs)¶

Converts a solution to a list of lists.

Parameters

inputs (list) – list of classifier’s inputs

Returns

solution as a list of lists

Return type

list
